reboot.name: Reboot Player
reboot.title: Rebooting Display
reboot.warning: The Rise Player on the Display's Computer will reboot and the currently Scheduled Content will be interrupted. Do you wish to proceed?

restart.name: Restart Player
restart.title: Restarting Display
restart.warning: The Rise Player on the Display's Computer will restart and the currently Scheduled Content will be interrupted. Do you wish to proceed?

monitor.warning: No Monitoring Emails have been set up for your Company. Please go to your Company Settings to configure.

upgrade.name: Player Upgrade:
upgrade.warning: Using any option other than Auto Upgrade may result in Presentation Content failures.

player.playerWarning: A Player has not been configured for this Display. To configure your Display click Download Player and install the software on the computer that will operate your Display. When the Player starts for the first time you will be prompted to enter the Display ID {{displayId}} to link the Player with the Display that you have setup here.
